mapper.insert: insert into entbase.file (file_path, fold_id, user_id, file_name, creat_time, update_time) values (#{FilePath}, #{FoldId}, #{UserId}, #{FileName}, #{CreatTime}, #{UpdateTime})
mapper.delete: delete from entbase.file where file_path like concat(#{path}, '/', '%') or file_path = #{path}
mapper.select: select * from entbase.file where file_path like concat(#{path}, '%') order by creat_time
